alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:20PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Umatilla and southwestern Union Counties through 300 PM PDT... At 220 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Starkey, or 21 miles southwest of La Grande, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grande, Meacham, Union, Island City, Cove, Telocaset, Kamela, Hilgard, Starkey and southern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County
